translation.zh: 狂暴的快乐往往预示着狂暴的结局

translation.en: And in their triumph die, like fire and powder.
translation.zh: 那欢愉的刹那 正如火与火药
爱德华 不要 她会看见你的

translation.en: Gran, I'd like you to meet--
I thought we agreed no presents.
Well, the one from me's not wrapped. So it doesn't count.
translation.zh: 我的没包装 所以不算
真好 谢谢 爸爸

translation.en: Uh, it goes with this one from your mom.
translation.zh:
还有这个是你妈妈送的
我们配合了一下

translation.en: We coordinated. Well, she coordinated me.
translation.zh:
还有这个是你妈妈送的
我们配合了一下 其实是她让我配合

translation.en: It's to, uh, put your pictures in from senior year.
translation.zh: 可以用来放高四的照片

translation.en: How'd you get so old so fast? I didn't.
translation.zh:
-你怎么老得这么快？
-我没老 没那么老

-你怎么老得这么快？
-我没老 没那么老 是吗？那是白头发吗？

translation.en: [man on radio] Another missing hiker brings the total to three presumed dead.
translation.zh:
又有一名驴友失踪
目前疑似死亡人数已增加到三人

translation.en: Rangers are searching for the killer animal--
translation.zh: 护林员正在寻找这只杀人的野兽…
今天是个大日子 贝拉

translation.en: Uh, R and J essay due? Oh, yeah.
translation.zh:
-《罗密欧与朱丽叶》的论文要交了
-是啊

translation.en: Let me take a picture of you guys.
My mom wants me to put together, like, a big scrapbook full of memories.
translation.zh: 我妈想让我做一本 充满回忆的剪贴簿

translation.en: -Oh, cool, yeah. -I take 'em, I'm not in 'em, so…
translation.zh:
-好啊
-我只站镜头后 不站镜头前

translation.en: You'll Photoshop this if my nose looks big, right?
translation.zh: 你会帮我修一下鼻子吧？

translation.en: [Eric] Don't worry, I'm in the picture. No one will be looking at you guys.
translation.zh: 别担心 有我在 没人会看你们

translation.en: Bell, your birth is definitely something to celebrate.
translation.zh: 贝拉 你的出生值得庆祝

translation.en: Yeah, but my aging is not. Your aging?
I think 18 is a little young to start worrying about that.
translation.zh: 18岁就开始担心变老也太早了点

translation.en: -It's one year older than you. -No, it isn't.
[Bella] Wow. Maybe I shouldn't be dating such an old man.
translation.zh: 那么也许我不该和老头子交往

translation.en: -Mmm. -It's gross. -[Bella] I should be thoroughly repulsed. -Mmm.
translation.zh: 太恶心了 我应该完全抗拒才对

translation.en: We have to go to class. Okay.
You know, anabolic steroids are really bad for you.
translation.zh: 合成类固醇对你的身体不好

translation.en: [Jacob chuckles] Well, I'm just filling out, Bella.
translation.zh: 合成类固醇对你的身体不好 我只是成长了 贝拉

translation.en: You know, it wouldn't seem so drastic if we hung out more.
translation.zh:
要是我们经常见面
就不会这么明显了

translation.en: You should switch schools. You can come hang out with the palefaces.
translation.zh:
你应该换换学校
这样就可以多跟白人接触了

translation.en: I'm all right. I prefer the rez school's exclusivity.
translation.zh:
没关系
我更喜欢保留区学校的排外主义

translation.en: They let any old riff-raff into this place.
translation.zh: 这儿的学校什么样的人都收

translation.en: I see. Then why are you slummin' it?
translation.zh: 好吧 那你为何要屈尊来此？

translation.en: I was just buying a part for the Rabbit.
You should really come take a ride when it's done.
translation.zh: 等装好以后 你真应该来坐坐我的车

translation.en: [Jacob] Your dad told my dad, so…
translation.zh: 你爸跟我爸说的 所以…

translation.en: I saw this the other day and thought of you.
translation.zh: 我前几天看到这个就想到了你

translation.en: -Good seeing you. -Yeah, I'll see you later.
translation.zh:
-很高兴见到你
-我也是 回见

translation.en: So how come Jacob Black gets to give you a gift and I don't?
translation.zh:
雅各布布莱克都可以送你礼物
为什么我不行？

translation.en: 'Cause I have nothing to give back to you.
translation.zh: 因为我没有东西可以回赠给你

translation.en: Bella, you give me everything just by breathing.
translation.zh: 贝拉 你活着就是给我的礼物

translation.en: [scoffs] I thought I said no presents.
I've already seen you open it, and guess what?
translation.zh:
你已经预见到你会打开它
你猜怎么着？

translation.en: You're gonna wear it tonight. Our place.
translation.zh: 你今晚会穿上它 去我们家

translation.en: [giggles] Great! Okay, I'll see you at seven.
Jasper. No fair with the mood control thing.
translation.zh: 贾斯帕 这不公平 你控制我的情绪
吸血鬼是不能相信的 相信我

translation.en: [man on TV] O, my love. My wife!
translation.zh: 我的爱人 我的妻子

translation.en: Death, that hath sucked the honey of thy breath,
translation.zh: 死亡虽然夺走了你甜美的呼吸

translation.en: but hath no power yet upon thy beauty.
[Edward] There are worse tragedies. Look at Romeo.
translation.zh: 有很多事比这更糟 你看罗密欧

translation.en: Killed his true love out of sheer stupidity.
translation.zh: 愚蠢地杀死了他的真爱

translation.en: But I do envy him one thing.
translation.zh: 不过有一点我很嫉妒他

translation.en: If you like that obviously beautiful sort of thing.
translation.zh: 如果你喜欢美丽的事物

translation.en: Not the girl, the, uh… the suicide.
translation.zh: 我指的不是那个姑娘 是自杀
而对人类来说 只需要一点点毒药

translation.en: 'Cause I had to consider it once.
translation.zh: 因为我曾经考虑过自杀

translation.en: [Edward] I didn't know if I'd get to you in time.
translation.zh: 我不知道能不能及时救下你

translation.en: I had to come up with some kind of… plan.
Go to Italy and provoke the Volturi.
translation.zh: 我打算去意大利 激怒沃尔图里家族

translation.en: [teacher] Now, who'd like to repeat the last few lines of iambic pentameter
translation.zh: 谁愿意复述一下最后几句五步格诗行

translation.en: just to show they were paying attention?
translation.zh: 证明自己有在认真听课？

translation.en: "O here, will I set up my everlasting rest…
…and shake the yoke of inauspicious stars from this world-wearied flesh.
translation.zh: 使这厌倦俗世的肉体挣脱灾厄的枷锁
眼睛 最后再看一眼
手臂 最后再拥抱一回

translation.en: And lips, O you, the doors of breath,
seal with a righteous kiss a dateless bargain to engrossing death."
translation.zh:
用一个堂堂正正的吻
与迷人的死亡订立永世的契约吧”

translation.en: [man on TV] Thus with a kiss, I die.
translation.zh: 我就这样在这一吻中死去

translation.en: [Edward] The Volturi are a very old, very powerful family.
translation.zh:
沃尔图里家族
是一个古老而强大的家族

translation.en: I guess they're the closest thing to royalty my world has.
translation.zh:
他们是我们的世界里
最近似皇室的家族

translation.en: He lived with them for a few decades.
translation.zh: 他和他们一起住了几十年

translation.en: No respect for human life, of course,
translation.zh: 不在乎人类的性命 但是…

translation.en: but respect for the arts and the sciences, at least.
translation.zh: 不在乎人类的性命 但是… 起码尊重艺术和科学

translation.en: And only one that's regularly enforced.
translation.zh: 只有一条是必须遵守的

translation.en: [Edward] That we keep the existence of our kind a secret.
translation.zh: 我们必须隐藏自己的存在

translation.en: We don't make spectacles of ourselves.

translation.zh: 也不能在光天化日下杀戮

translation.en: Unless, of course, you want to die.
You gotta stop talking about that.
I can't even think… about someone hurting you.
translation.zh: 我根本不敢去想有人伤害你

translation.en: Bella. The only thing that can hurt me is you.
translation.zh: 贝拉 能伤害到我的只有你

translation.en: And I don't have anything else to be afraid of.
Victoria. She'll come for me one day.
translation.zh: 维多利亚？她总有一天会来找我

translation.en: Alice will see when she decides, and… And we'll be ready.
translation.zh:
一旦她下定决心 爱丽丝就会预见到
我们会做好准备

translation.en: Bella. You already do protect me.
translation.zh: 贝拉 你已经在保护我了

translation.en: to stay alive, if that's what I am.
translation.zh: 唯一理由 如果我算是活着的话

translation.en: But it's my job to protect you.

translation.zh: 我会保护你免受我妹妹之外的人伤害

translation.en: It's time, it's time, it's time.
Sorry about all this. We tried to rein Alice in.

真是不好意思 -我们想要管住爱丽丝的
-可惜她根本管不住

translation.en: As if that were even possible. Happy birthday, Bella.
translation.zh:
-我们想要管住爱丽丝的
-可惜她根本管不住 -生日快乐 贝拉
-谢谢

translation.en: I… found it in your bag. Mind?
translation.zh:
这是在你的包里找到的
你不介意吧？

translation.en: It's a necklace. Alice picked it out.
translation.zh: 是条项链 爱丽丝选的

translation.en: Already installed it in your truck.
translation.zh: 已经装到你的卡车上了

translation.en: Finally a decent sound system for that piece of--
Hey, don't… don't hate the truck.
translation.zh:
-像样的音响了
-别讨厌我的卡车
这是埃斯梅和卡莱尔的

translation.en: [Carlisle] Just a little something to brighten your day.
translation.zh: 一个能让你开心起来的小玩意

translation.en: Yes, you've been looking kind of pale lately.
translation.zh: 是啊 你最近脸色不太好

translation.en: -[Jasper panting] -Jaz, Jaz, shh, shh. It's okay. It's just a little…
translation.zh: 贾斯…没事了 只是一点…
抱歉 我不能待在这儿

translation.en: I'll have to stitch this up in my office.
[Carlisle] I'm sure he's very upset with himself,
translation.zh: 他现在一定很生自己的气

translation.en: and I doubt he'll listen to anyone but you right now.

translation.en: [Bella] I never wanted to have a party.
Jasper hasn't been away from human blood as long as the rest of us.

贾斯帕戒除人类鲜血的时间
没有我们长

translation.en: [Bella] Did you ever think of… just doing it the easy way?
translation.zh: 你就没有想过放纵自己吗？

translation.en: -I knew who I wanted to be. -[tool clinks] I wanted to help people.

我知道自己想要成为什么样的人
我想帮助别人

translation.en: -Brings me happiness. -[snips] -Even if I am damned, regardless. -[scissors clink]
translation.zh: 这让我感到快乐 尽管我受到诅咒
卡莱尔 你没有被诅咒

translation.en: You've always been very… gracious about us.
So that's it. That's why he won't change me?
translation.zh:
就因为这个吗？
这就是他不肯转变我的理由吗？

translation.en: Imagine the situation in reverse, hmm?
If you believed as Edward does,
translation.zh: 假如你像爱德华一样坚信这一点

translation.en: could you take away his soul?
At some point, something's gonna separate us.
translation.zh: 我们总有一天会被分开

translation.en: It's gonna be an accident or illness,

translation.en: And the only solution is to change me.
That's not a solution, that's a tragedy.

translation.en: You're not gonna want me when I look like a grandmother.

等我变成老太婆
你就不会想要和我在一起了

translation.en: Bella, do you not understand my feelings for you at all?
translation.zh:
贝拉 你一点也不明白
我对你的感情吗？

translation.en: How you feel about your soul.

translation.zh: 所以不用为我的灵魂操心

translation.en: So can I ask one thing?
Come and take a walk with me.

translation.zh: 我们必须离开福克斯了

translation.en: Carlisle is supposed to be ten years older than he looks,

translation.en: and people are starting to notice.
Okay, I… [sighs] I've got to think of something to say to Charlie.

translation.en: I mean my family and myself.

translation.en: Edward, what happened with Jasper… It's nothing.

translation.en: Nothing but what I always expected.
translation.zh: 可那是我一直害怕的事

translation.en: And nothing compared to what could have happened.

与可能发生的事比起来
这确实不算什么

translation.en: You just don't belong in my world, Bella.

translation.en: I don't want you to come.

translation.en: That changes things. A lot. [exhales deeply]
But if it's not too much to ask,

translation.en: can you just promise me something?
And I'll promise something to you in return.
This is the last time you'll ever see me.
translation.zh: 这会是你最后一次见到我

translation.en: And you can go on with your life without any interference from me.
translation.zh: 我不会再干涉你的生活

translation.en: It'll be like… I never existed, I promise.

translation.en: If this is about my soul, take it. I don't want it without you.

如果是因为我的灵魂 那就拿去
没有你 我也不想要它了

translation.en: You're just not good for me.
Not good enough for you. [breathes shakily]
I'm just sorry I let this go on for so long.
I'm going to try the Cullens' place again.
translation.zh: 我再给卡伦家打个电话

translation.en: The Cullens left town, Charlie. Good riddance.
translation.zh:
-卡伦一家离开小镇了 查理
-终于走了
我们会找到她的 查理

translation.en: I got her. Thank you, Sam.

translation.en: Who else can I talk to? I'm lost.

translation.en: But the absence of him is everywhere I look.
translation.zh: 我茫然四顾 再也找不到他的身影

translation.en: It's like a huge hole has been punched through my chest.
translation.zh: 我的胸膛仿佛被开了个大洞

translation.en: [Bella] But in a way, I'm glad.
The pain is my only reminder that he was real.

也是你们存在过的证据

translation.en: You're going to Jacksonville. Live with your mother.

贝拉 他不会回来了

translation.en: It's just not normal, this behavior.
[Charlie] Quite frankly, it's scaring the hell out of me and your mother.
translation.zh: 说实话 我和你妈妈都快被你吓死了

translation.en: Baby, I… I don't want you to leave.
translation.zh: 宝贝 我也不想让你离开

translation.en: I don't, but just go. Go to Jacksonville.

真的 但你还是走吧 去杰克逊维尔
交几个新朋友

translation.en: -Make some new friends. -I like my old friends.
translation.zh:
真的 但你还是走吧 去杰克逊维尔
交几个新朋友 我喜欢我的老朋友

translation.en: [Charlie] Well, you never see 'em anymore. I do, I…
translation.zh:
-可你都不跟他们一起玩了
-玩的

translation.en: I'm… [sighs] …gonna, uh, go shopping tomorrow with Jessica.
translation.zh: 我明天要和杰西卡一起上街购物

translation.en: I like it. Go. Buy some stuff.
translation.zh: 我喜欢 去给自己买点东西吧
喂？杰西卡 我是贝拉

translation.en: [Jessica] I don't know why you want to sit through
all those zombies eating people and no hot guys kissing anybody.
translation.zh:
耐着性子看这种僵尸吃人的片子
又没有帅哥的吻戏

translation.en: It's gross, like… Why are there that many zombie movies anyway?
translation.zh:
太恶心了
话说为什么有这么多僵尸片啊？

translation.en: If it's supposed to, like, draw a parallel about leprosy,
translation.zh: 如果是为了类比麻风病

translation.en: my cousin had leprosy. It's not funny, you know.
translation.zh: 我堂兄就有麻风病 这不好笑

translation.en: And, like, is it supposed to be a metaphor for consumerism,
translation.zh: 还是为了暗喻消费主义？

translation.en: 'cause don't be so pleased with your own, like,
translation.zh: 警告人们不要自我感觉良好

translation.en: Like, some girls like to shop. Not all girls, apparently.
translation.zh:
有些女生喜欢购物
但不是所有女生都喜欢

translation.en: Though I was surprised you even called at all, you know?
translation.zh: 不过你能给我打电话我就很惊讶了

translation.en: Like, your depression thing, I get it.
translation.zh: 你心情不好 我理解

translation.en: I'm totally, totally worried. But after a while, it's like,
translation.zh:
我也真的很为你担心
但事情都过去这么久了

translation.en: -you're still bumming? -[man] Want a ride, girls? And I'm going through stuff too.
translation.zh:
-你还在耿耿于怀 我也有烦心事的
-要兜风吗？
迈克说只想和我做朋友 你好吗？看我们发现了什么
这很让人难受的 “只是朋友”什么时候…

translation.en: -What's up, guys? -[indistinct chatter] Where are you going?
translation.zh:
-你好吗？
-看我们发现了什么 你要去哪？

translation.en: -[man] Come here for a sec. -[Jessica scoffs]
I think I know those guys.
[man] We got beer. We got bikes.
translation.zh: 这里有啤酒 有摩托车

translation.en: Well, they seem great. Can we go?
translation.zh: 他们看起来不错 可以走了吗？

translation.en: All right, all right, we got a taker.
-Turn around. -♪ All my life I've been searching♪
I'm sorry, I thought you were somebody else.
No, that's cool. I'll be whoever you want me to be, honey.
translation.zh:
没关系 你想让我是什么人
我就是什么人 宝贝
你保证过不会鲁莽行事

translation.en: You promised it would be as if you never existed.
translation.zh:
你保证过你会彻底消失
就好像从未存在过

translation.en: Did you say something, babe? You know what, never mind.
translation.zh:
-你骗人
-你说什么了吗？宝贝 算了 没事

translation.en: [Jessica] Hey, um, what the hell's wrong with you?
I thought that I saw something. You… oh.

translation.zh: 你疯了 或者是有自杀倾向

translation.en: That homeboy could have been a psycho.
translation.zh: 那哥们没准是个精神病

translation.en: I was about to end up in an FBI interview room like some lame TV show.
translation.zh:
我差点就像烂电视剧里那样
去联调局录口供了

translation.en: God, that was such a rush.
translation.zh: 老天 真是太刺激了

translation.en: Awesome, so you're an adrenaline junkie now?
translation.zh: 好极了 你现在喜欢找刺激了？

translation.en: That's cool, you can go bungee jumping.
translation.zh: 没关系 你可以去蹦极

translation.en: You don't get on the back of some random loser's motorcycle.
translation.zh: 不要随便坐不认识的人渣的摩托车
爱丽丝 我看见他了

translation.en: Maybe I'm crazy now. I guess that's okay.
translation.zh: 也许我是疯了 这也没关系

translation.en: If a rush of danger is what it takes to see him,
translation.zh: 如果冒险能让我见到他

translation.en: Where the hell have you been, loca?

translation.zh: 天啊 废旧金属 你太客气了

translation.en: -You shouldn't have. -I saved it from the junkyard.
translation.zh: 废旧金属 你太客气了 这是从废品站找来的

translation.en: I think they'll probably cost more to fix than they're worth.
translation.zh: 我觉得它们也许不值得花钱修理

translation.en: But then I thought that if I had a mechanic friend
translation.zh:
但我又一想
如果能有个玩机械的朋友

translation.en: - to help me out, then… - Ah, me.
translation.zh:
来帮忙的话… -我就是那个玩机械的朋友？
-是啊

translation.en: Being the mechanic-type friend? [Bella] That's right.
translation.zh:
-我就是那个玩机械的朋友？
-是啊

translation.en: Since when are you into motorcycles? Since now.
translation.zh:
-你从什么时候开始喜欢摩托车了？
-从现在开始

translation.en: I get it if you think that this is really stupid and reckless.
translation.zh: 你大概会认为这样很愚蠢 而且鲁莽

translation.en: Yeah, I mean it's completely stupid and reckless.
translation.zh: 是啊 特别愚蠢而鲁莽

translation.en: Oh, wait, be careful. Those things are actually really heavy, so…
Jake, you're, like, buff. How did that happen?
translation.zh: 杰克 你力气真大 怎么做到的？你才16岁 我不明白

translation.en: You're, like, 16. I don't get it.
translation.zh: 怎么做到的？你才16岁 我不明白

translation.en: [chuckles] Age is just a number, baby.
translation.zh:
怎么做到的？你才16岁 我不明白 年龄只是一个数字
你多大？40岁吗？

年龄只是一个数字
你多大？40岁吗？

translation.en: -♪ I may never ever find a cure ♪ -Feels like that sometimes.
That song's good. You don't like it?
translation.zh: 那首歌挺好听的 你不喜欢？

translation.en: Um, I don't really like… …music anymore, kind of.
So, I was thinking, if we're going to do this every day,
translation.zh: 我在想 如果每天都要修车的话

translation.en: we have to, like, fit some homework in there somewhere.
translation.zh: 我们就得抽时间把作业写了

translation.en: I don't want Billy thinking that I'm a bad influence on you.
translation.zh: 我不想让比利觉得我把你给带坏了
你…我年纪比你大 所以当然是我带坏你

translation.en: …that makes me the influencer, and you the influencee.
My size and knowledge base actually makes me older than you,
translation.zh:
你身体柔弱 不通世事
而我的体格和学识都强过你

translation.en: because of your general paleness and lack of know-how.
I convinced you to build two-wheeled death machines with me.
translation.zh: 我说服你和我一起组装两轮杀人机器

translation.en: Don't you think that makes you kind of young and naive?
translation.zh: 你不觉得这样显得你也很幼稚吗？

translation.en: Okay, so where do we stand?
translation.zh: 好吧 那我们怎么定位？

translation.en: I'm 35. -And you might be, like, 32. -[knock at door] -Come on. -[door opens]
[man] Yo, Jake, you in there? No, it's ok, it's just my boys.
translation.zh:
-杰克 你在吗？
-没事 是我朋友

-贝拉 这是奎尔和恩布里
-你们好
原来你们真的在组装摩托车

translation.en: Oh, yeah, yeah. I taught him everything he knows.
translation.zh: 是啊 他的本事都是我教的

translation.en: What about the part where you're his girlfriend?
translation.zh: 那你真的是他的女朋友？

translation.en: Actually, remember I said she's a girl and a friend.
translation.zh:
-露馅了吧
-事实上 我说的是 她是女生 是我的朋友

translation.en: Embry, do you remember him making that distinction?
translation.zh: 恩布里 他有这样区分过吗？

translation.en: So you guys have girlfriends. That's awesome.
Yeah, right. Quil's actually taking his cousin to prom.
translation.zh:
是啊 奎尔参加毕业舞会
都是和表妹一起

translation.en: You want funny, Black? I'll give you funny.
translation.zh: 布莱克 你想找乐子？我给你点乐子

translation.en: [Embry] I got five bucks on Quil.
[Bella] Dear Alice, I wish I had your real address.
translation.zh: 亲爱的爱丽丝 真想知道你的地址

translation.en: I wish I could tell you about Jake.
translation.zh: 真想把杰克的事讲给你听

translation.en: I mean, he makes me feel alive.
translation.zh: 他让我有了活着的感觉

translation.en: Well, when I'm with Jake, it's… …it's like it's almost healed.
translation.zh: 我胸口的大洞仿佛暂时地

translation.en: [Jacob] So, Quil keeps asking to come over. I think he likes you a little too much.
translation.zh:
奎尔总说要过来
我觉得他过于喜欢你了

translation.en: Well, I'm really not into the whole cougar thing, you know?
What's up with you and age?
translation.zh: 你为什么总是纠结年龄？

translation.en: I mean, how old was that Cullen guy anyway?
[Bella] But even Jake can't keep the dreams away.
translation.zh: 可就连杰克也没法赶走我的噩梦

translation.en: -[door opens] -Hey, hey, hey. Hey, hey, hey.
Well, I thought this thing was starting to work, but… I guess not.
translation.zh: 我以为你开始好转了 看来没有

translation.en: That seems to take your mind off things a bit, doesn't it?
translation.zh: 似乎让你变得开朗了一些 对吗？

translation.en: …you gotta learn to love what's good for you.
translation.zh: 你要学着去爱对你好的人

translation.en: Of course, what do I know?
translation.zh: 当然了 我又懂什么呢？
我只是个无可救药的单身汉

translation.en: If I told you I couldn't have fixed these bikes, what would you have said?
translation.zh:
如果我说我修不好摩托车
你会怎么说？

translation.en: Are you doubting your mad skills?
translation.zh: 你在怀疑自己高超的技术吗？

translation.en: No. Definitely not. I mean, they'll run fine.
translation.zh: 当然没有 会修好的

translation.en: Maybe if I was smart, I would have dragged out the rebuild a bit.
translation.zh:
我要是聪明的话
就应该把组装时间拖得久一点

translation.en: If you told me you couldn't fix these bikes,
translation.zh: 你要是说你修不好摩托车

translation.en: I would say that that's really too bad,
but that we're just gonna have to find something else to do.
translation.zh: 不过我们可以找点别的事情做

translation.en: -[distant shouting] -[Jacob] Yeah. Him and his cult.
translation.zh: 是的 他和他的崇拜者

translation.en: They're not really fighting, Bella. They're cliff diving.
translation.zh:
他们不是在打架 贝拉
他们是在高崖跳水

translation.en: Scary as hell, but a total rush.
translation.zh: 虽然很吓人 但特别刺激

translation.en: A rush? [Jacob] Most of us jump from lower down.
translation.zh:
-刺激？
-我们大多从低一点的地方往下跳

translation.en: We leave the showing off to Sam and his disciples.
translation.zh: 好让山姆和他的崇拜者去炫耀

translation.en: You have some kind of beef with him or something?
[Jacob] They just think they run this place.
translation.zh: 他们认为自己是这地方的统治者

translation.en: Embry used to call them hall monitors on steroids.
translation.zh:
恩布里以前说他们
是打了激素的纠察队

translation.en: Now, all of a sudden, he started following Sam around like a little puppy.
translation.zh: 然后突然之间就成了山姆的跟屁虫

translation.en: Same thing happened with Paul and Jared.
translation.zh: 保罗和杰莱德也是这样

translation.en: Sam keeps giving me this look.
translation.zh: 山姆看我的眼神很奇怪

translation.en: Like he's waiting for me or something.
It's kind of starting to freak me out.
Well, you should just avoid him.
-I want to go again. -Are you trying to get yourself killed?
translation.zh: 我想再试一次 你是想自杀吗？

translation.en: -I want to go again. -No, forget it.
translation.zh:
-不 我想再试一次
-不行 别想了

translation.en: Well, it's just blood, Bella. No big deal.
translation.zh: 只是流血而已 贝拉 没什么大不了的

translation.en: How hard did you hit your head?
translation.zh: 你的脑袋被撞出毛病了吧？

translation.en: [Angela] I did see something in the woods.
translation.zh: 我确实看见树林里有东西
当然 宝贝 我相信你

translation.en: No, he doesn't. He's just trying to get lucky.
translation.zh: 他才不相信 他只是想讨好你

translation.en: [Angela] No. It was jet black and huge.
translation.zh: 没关系 它浑身漆黑 巨大无比

translation.en: On all fours, it was still taller than a person.
translation.zh: 哪怕四脚着地也比人高

translation.en: Or an alien. You're lucky you didn't get probed.
translation.zh:
或者外星人
幸好你没有被抓去做实验

translation.en: [Bella] You know you're not the only one.
Um, my dad's been getting reports at the station.
translation.zh: 我爸爸在警局接到报案

translation.en: Like, five hikers have been killed by some bear,
translation.zh: 已经有五名驴友被熊杀死了

translation.en: but they can't find the bear.
Last time you clowns doubt my girlfriend.
translation.zh: 看你们下次谁还不信我女朋友

translation.en: Um, so listen, you know, now that, you know, you're talking and, uh…
eating again, which, you know, gotta get that protein in there.
translation.zh: 也开始吃东西了 你得多长点肉

translation.en: I was just wondering if you wanted to go see a movie with me.
translation.zh: 我想问问你要不要和我一起去看电影

translation.en: Cool, um… Let me see, we could check out, um…
translation.zh: 太好了 我想想 我们可以去看

translation.en: [clicks tongue] Love Spelled Backwards Is Love.
You know, it's a dumb title, but, um, it's a romantic comedy.
translation.zh: 片名挺蠢的 但是部爱情喜剧

translation.en: -I mean, it's supposed to be… -No. No romance.
How about Face Punch? Have you heard of that?
[stammers] I mean, that's an action movie.

translation.zh: 劲爆枪战 肾上腺素狂飙

translation.en: We should get a bunch of people to go. Do you guys want to go see…
translation.zh:
应该多喊几个人
你们要去看《当面一拳》吗？

应该多喊几个人
你们要去看《当面一拳》吗？ 《当面一拳》 好啊

translation.en: Mike, hey. We were supposed to watch that.
translation.zh: 迈克 是我们打算去看的那个

translation.en: [Jessica] Yeah. Movie night with Bella. [chuckles awkwardly]
translation.zh: 好啊 要跟贝拉去看电影了

translation.en: You know, are you even old enough to see this movie?
translation.zh: 你的年龄够看这部电影吗？

translation.en: I mean, you know, without, like, adult supervision?
translation.zh: 我是说 需不需要大人陪同

translation.en: Right, yeah. Well, she's buying my ticket for me.
Jessica bailed, and Angela got the stomach flu,
translation.zh: 杰西卡放鸽子了 安吉拉得了肠胃炎

translation.en: so Eric's taking care of her.

translation.zh:
-所以只有我们三个了
-太好了

translation.en: -[gun cocks in movie] -[man 1] Put your gun down.
[man 2] Put her gun down, or I'm gonna blow your frickin' head off.
translation.zh: 把枪放下 否则我一枪崩了你的脑袋

translation.en: [man 3] Both of you put both of your guns down,
or I'm gonna blow both of your frickin' heads off.
translation.zh: 否则我把你们俩的脑袋都崩了

translation.en: [man 1] All right, forget it. Let's do this!
translation.zh: 行了 别磨蹭 赶紧开打

translation.en: Okay, I… I think I'm gonna throw up. [groans]
translation.zh: 好吧 我觉得我要吐了

translation.en: You should hold out for someone with a stronger stomach.
translation.zh: 你应该找肠胃好点的人

translation.en: Someone who laughs at the gore that makes weaker men vomit.
translation.zh:
别人见血呕吐不止
他却一笑而过的那种

translation.en: Yeah, I'll keep my eye open for that.
I feel bad, he probably has that flu that's… going around.
translation.zh:
我感觉挺过意不去的
他没准也得肠胃炎了

translation.en: What, I can't hold your hand?
translation.zh: 怎么？我不能牵你的手吗？

translation.en: I just think it, you know, means something a little different to you, so…
translation.zh:
我只是觉得这对你有不同的意义
所以…

translation.en: Okay, well, tell me something. You like me, right?
translation.zh: 好吧 告诉我 你喜欢我 对吗？

translation.en: And you think I'm sort of beautiful.

translation.zh: 雅各布 拜托 别这样

translation.en: Well, I've got loads of time.
It's just 'cause I don't want you to go anywhere.
translation.zh: 这只是因为我不想让你离开我

translation.en: You know, I'm not like a car that you can fix up.
translation.zh: 我又不是车 可以让你来修理

translation.en: I'm never gonna run right, so I should be fair to you.
translation.zh:
我再也没法恢复正常了
所以我应该对你公平一点

translation.en: I know what he did to you.
translation.zh: 我知道他对你做了什么

translation.en: And Bella, I would never, ever do that.
translation.zh: 但是我永远不会这样对你 贝拉

translation.en: I won't ever hurt you. I promise.
translation.zh: 我永远不会伤害你 我保证

translation.en: I'm… I was feeling sick before the movie, okay?
translation.zh: 我在电影开场前就觉得恶心了
现在吗？你就是我的问题

translation.en: Feeling sick? Maybe you need to go to the hospital.
translation.zh: 觉得恶心？那你应该去医院

translation.en: You want me to put you in the hospital?
translation.zh: 需要我把你送进医院吗？

translation.en: Jake. Jake, Jake, the movie's over. What are you doing?
translation.zh:
杰克…电影都结束了
你这是干什么？

translation.en: Like, you feel like you have a fever. Are you okay?
translation.zh: 你好像发烧了 你没事吧？

translation.en: [Bella on phone] Jake, your dad says you have mono?
translation.zh:
杰克 你爸爸说
你得了单核细胞增多症

translation.en: He won't let me visit, but would you call me?
translation.zh:
他不让我去看你
能给我回个电话吗？

translation.en: Hey. It's me again, I just…
I'm sorry about what I said at the movie theater.
translation.zh: 很抱歉在电影院里说了那些话

translation.en: I just wanted to hear your voice, so no pressure.
translation.zh: 我只想听听你的声音 别有压力

translation.en: [Charlie] Okay. We should be back around three.
translation.zh: 好 我们大概3点回来

translation.en: Look, I don't have to go fishing today.
translation.zh: 听着 我今天并不是非得去钓鱼

translation.en: Yeah, you do. Go. What are you talking about?
translation.zh: 你得去 去吧 你在胡说什么啊？

translation.en: Those bears won't get the drop on me, Bella.
translation.zh: 那些熊伤不了我 贝拉

translation.en: I thought you were too sick to come outside.
translation.zh: 我以为你病得没法出门

translation.en: Or pick up the phone when I call.
What happened to you? What's wrong? Hey!
Did Sam get to you? Is that what's happening?
translation.zh: 山姆找你麻烦了？是这样吗？

translation.en: No, Sam's trying to help me. Don't blame him.
translation.zh: 山姆是在帮我 不要怪他

translation.en: But if you want somebody to blame,
how about those filthy bloodsuckers you love? The Cullens.
translation.zh:
就去怪你爱的那些肮脏的吸血鬼
去怪卡伦一家吧

translation.en: -I don't know what you're talking about. -You know exactly what I'm talking about.
translation.zh: 我不知道你在说什么 不 你很清楚我在说什么

translation.en: You've been lying to everyone. Charlie.
translation.zh: 你一直在欺骗所有人 欺骗查理

translation.en: But you can't lie to me.

translation.zh:
-再也骗不了了 贝拉
-雅各布

translation.en: [stammering] Jake, I know that I've been… …hurting you.
translation.zh: 杰克 我知道我一直在伤害你

translation.en: I just need… maybe, give me, like, some time or something--
translation.zh:
我只是需要…给我… -给我一点时间
-别说了

translation.en: It's not you, it's me, right? Really?
translation.zh: 不是你的问题 是我的问题 对吗？
是真的 是我的问题

translation.en: I used to be. A good kid.
This doesn't even matter, all right?
translation.zh: 这根本不重要 好吗？

translation.en: -This is over. -You can't break up with me.
translation.zh:
-我们结束了
-你不能跟我分手

translation.en: I mean, you're my best friend.
translation.zh: 我是说 你是我最好的朋友

translation.en: I promised I wouldn't hurt you, Bella.
translation.zh: 我保证过不会伤害你 贝拉

translation.en: And this is me keeping that promise.
translation.zh: 我这么做就是为了遵守承诺

translation.en: And don't come back. Or you're gonna get hurt.
translation.zh: 不要再回来了 不然你会受伤的

translation.en: Without Jake, I just… I can't stand it.
translation.zh: 没有杰克 我再也撑不下去了

translation.en: But I really feel like he never existed.
translation.zh:
他真的会彻底消失
仿佛从未存在过吗？

translation.en: I will find the place where I can see him again.
translation.zh: 我会找到能重新见到他的地方

translation.en: I didn't expect to find you here.
translation.zh: 没想到会在这儿遇见你

translation.en: I went to visit Cullens, but… their house is empty.
translation.zh:
我来拜访卡伦一家
结果房子里空无一人

translation.en: I'm surprised they left you behind.
I'll tell them that you stopped by.

translation.zh: 不过也许我不应该… 告诉爱德华

translation.en: But he's far away, isn't he?
translation.zh: 可他远在天边 不是吗？

translation.en: I came as a… favor to Victoria.
translation.zh: 我来帮维多利亚一个忙

translation.en: She asked me to see if you were still under the protection of the Cullens.
translation.zh:
-维多利亚？
-她让我来看看 卡伦一家是不是还在保护你

translation.en: Victoria feels it's only fair to kill Edward's mate,
translation.zh:
爱德华杀了维多利亚的爱人
维多利亚觉得应该杀掉他的爱人

translation.en: given he killed hers. An eye for an eye.
translation.zh: 这样才算公平 以牙还牙

translation.en: Edward would know who did it. And he'd come after you.
translation.zh:
爱德华会知道是你杀了我
他不会放过你

translation.en: After all, how much could you mean to him
if he left you here unprotected?
translation.zh: 你对他来说又能有多重要？

translation.en: Oh, Victoria won't be happy about my killing you.
translation.zh: 我杀了你 维多利亚不会高兴的

translation.en: But I can't help myself. You are so mouthwatering.
translation.zh: 但我控制不住我自己 你真的太诱人了

translation.en: Please don't. I mean, you helped us. No, no, no, shh, shh.
translation.zh:
-不要这样 你帮过我们
-不…

translation.en: Don't be afraid. I'm doing you a kindness.
translation.zh: 别害怕 我这是为了你好

translation.en: [whispers] Victoria plans on killing you slowly.
translation.zh: 维多利亚打算慢慢地杀死你

translation.en: Dad, I saw them. What's the matter?
-In the woods. They're not bears. -What do you mean, in the woods?
translation.zh:
-在树林里 它们不是熊
-“在树林里”是什么意思？

translation.en: Bell, what the hell were you doing out in the woods?
translation.zh: 贝尔 你去树林里做什么？

translation.en: They're wolves. I mean, they're, like, huge wolves.
Are you sure about that, Bella?
Yeah, I just saw them. They were after… something.
translation.zh: 确实 我看到了 它们在追…什么东西

translation.en: Feel like going hunting? Get some of your guys together?
translation.zh: 想出去打猎吗？带上你的人一起？

translation.en: Sure, yeah, I'll, I'll just, uh…
[Bella] By now, those wolves will be dead.
translation.zh: 现在那些狼应该已经死了

translation.en: And Laurent would have told her I'm unprotected.
translation.zh: 劳伦特会告诉她 没人保护我

translation.en: I should go to the station.
Dad, you should… you should go.
[Charlie] Can you just stay in the house?
Oh, you scared me. What the hell are you doing?
translation.zh:
你吓到我了 -你在干什么？
-退后 我要上去了

-你在干什么？
-退后 我要上去了

translation.en: Have you ever had a secret you couldn't tell anyone?
translation.zh: 你有过不可告人的秘密吗？

translation.en: One that wasn't yours to share?
translation.zh: 而且那秘密还不属于你？

translation.en: Well, that's what it's like for me.
You have no idea how tight I'm bound.
translation.zh: 你不知道我受到的约束有多大

translation.en: I hate what they've done to you.
translation.zh: 我讨厌他们对你做的一切

translation.en: I mean, the killer part is you already know.
translation.zh: 最让我痛苦的是 你已经知道了

translation.en: Bella, do you remember when we walked on the beach at La Push?
translation.zh:
贝拉 还记得我们
在拉普西的海滩上散步那天吗？
那个故事 那个关于…

translation.en: I guess I understand why that's the only part you remember.
translation.zh: 我想我理解你为什么只记得那一部分

translation.en: -that you can do. -No. I'm in it for life.
translation.zh: 一定有什么办法吧 不 我一辈子都要受约束

translation.en: Maybe we should just get out of here for awhile.
translation.zh: 也许我们可以离开这里一段时间

translation.en: We'll just leave. Just you and me.
translation.zh: 远走高飞 只有你和我

translation.en: I would do it for you.
It's not something I can just run away from, Bella.
translation.zh: 这不是逃避就能解决的问题 贝拉

translation.en: But I would run away with you.
I gotta go. They'll start wondering where I am.
translation.zh: 我得走了 他们会起疑心的
拜托你 一定要想起来

translation.en: It'd be so much easier if you knew.
translation.zh: 如果你能知道 我会好受很多
我会努力 但是杰克…

translation.en: Jake, what are you doing? Wait, Jake.
translation.zh: 杰克 你在做什么？等等 杰克

translation.en: [Jacob] Really, it's just, like, an old story.
I'm not really supposed to say anything about it.
Did you know Quileutes are supposedly descended from wolves?
translation.zh:
你知道奎鲁特人
被认为是狼的后裔吗？

translation.en: Look, I'm sorry, I really need to see him.
translation.zh: 好吧 抱歉 我真的需要见他

translation.en: -He didn't want this. -What did we do?
translation.zh:
他不想要这样 我们做了什么？他做了什么？
他跟你说了什么？

translation.en: What did he do, hmm? What'd he tell you?
translation.zh:
我们做了什么？他做了什么？
他跟你说了什么？

translation.en: He tells me nothing because he's scared of you.
translation.zh: 他什么都没说 因为他害怕你

translation.en: Hey. Take Bella back to Emily's place.
Guess the wolf's out of the bag.
[Bella] Alice, is it possible that everything is true?
translation.zh:
爱丽丝
是不是所有的故事都是真的？

translation.en: The fairy tales and horror stories.
translation.zh: 无论是童话故事还是恐怖故事？

translation.en: Is it possible that there isn't anything sane and normal at all?
translation.zh: 是不是世上根本没有所谓的正常？

translation.en: Hey, I think we should go back and see if Jacob's okay.
translation.zh: 我们应该回去看看雅各布有没有事

translation.en: I hope Paul sinks some teeth in him. Serves him right.
translation.zh: 希望保罗咬他一口 给他点教训

translation.en: No way, Jacob's a natural. You see him phase on the fly?
translation.zh:
不可能 雅各布是天生的战士 你看到他在半空中变身了吗？
我赌5块钱 保罗根本碰不到他

translation.en: [Jared] I got five says Paul doesn't touch him.
translation.zh:
你看到他在半空中变身了吗？
我赌5块钱 保罗根本碰不到他

translation.en: Come on in, Bella. We won't bite.
translation.zh: 进来吧 贝拉 我们不咬人

translation.en: Oh, hey, about Emily, Sam's fiancée. Don't stare. It bugs Sam.
translation.zh:
对了 那个艾米丽 山姆的未婚妻
别盯着她看 山姆会生气

translation.en: [Emily] You guys hungry? Like I have to ask.
translation.zh: 你们饿了吗？根本不用问
贝拉斯旺 还能是谁？

translation.en: Hmm, so… You're the vampire girl.
translation.zh: 你就是那个吸血鬼女孩

translation.en: Guess so. Well, I'm engaged to one.
translation.zh: 大概吧 我和狼人订了婚

translation.en: Save some for your brothers. And ladies first. Muffin?
translation.zh:
给你们的兄弟留点
女士优先 来点松饼吗？

translation.en: Leave it to Jacob to find a way around Sam's gag order.
translation.zh: 让雅各布去跟山姆解释泄密的事吧

translation.en: Um, he didn't say anything to me.
Alpha's orders get obeyed whether we want 'em to or not.
translation.zh: 不管愿不愿意 都得听首领的

translation.en: Oh, and check it out. We can hear each other's thoughts.
translation.zh: 还有 我们能听到彼此的思想

translation.en: Would you shut up? These are trade secrets.
translation.zh: 能闭嘴吗？这是商业机密 见鬼

translation.en: Damn it! This chick runs with vampires.
translation.zh: 能闭嘴吗？这是商业机密 见鬼 这妞可是跟着吸血鬼到处跑的人

translation.en: You can't really run with vampires.
translation.zh: 我可没法跟着吸血鬼到处跑

translation.en: You're not the first monsters I've met.
translation.zh: 我又不是第一次看见怪兽

translation.en: Jake's right. You're good with weird.
translation.zh: 杰克说得对 你很擅长和怪人打交道
是啊 据我所知是这样

translation.en: A few lucky members of the tribe have the gene.
translation.zh:
只有少数幸运的部族成员
携带狼人的基因

translation.en: If a bloodsucker moves into town, then the fever sets in.
translation.zh: 如果镇上有吸血鬼 我们就会发烧

translation.en: Well, can't you find a way to just… stop?
translation.zh: 就不能想个办法停止这一切吗？

translation.en: It's not a lifestyle choice, Bella.
translation.zh: 这又不是选择生活方式 贝拉

translation.en: I was born this way, I can't help it.
translation.zh: 我生来就是这样 我也没有办法

translation.en: You're such a hypocrite. What, I'm not the right kind of monster for you?
translation.zh:
你可真是个伪君子
我这种怪兽不合你的胃口吗？
问题不在于你们的身份

translation.en: It's what you do. They never hurt anybody.
translation.zh:
而在于你们的所作所为
他们从来不会伤人
而你们会杀人 杰克 贝拉 我们没有杀人
贝拉 我们没有杀人

translation.en: What we're trying to protect you people from.
translation.zh:
我们就是为了从他们手中
保护你们人类

translation.en: The only thing we do kill.
Don't worry, we can't touch your little precious Cullens
translation.zh:
别担心
我们不会动你亲爱的卡伦一家

translation.en: I… It's not what I'm saying. [stutters]

translation.zh: 你杀不了吸血鬼 他们会…

translation.en: Really? We took out that leech with the dreads easy enough.
translation.zh: 是吗？我们很轻松就把他干掉了

translation.en: And his red-headed girlfriend is next.
translation.zh: 下一个是他的红发女友

translation.en: Was. We chased her all the way to the Canadian border the other night.
translation.zh:
她来过 那天晚上
我们把她一路赶出了加拿大边境

translation.en: She keeps coming back. We don't know what she's after.
translation.zh:
可她不断跑回来
我们不知道她在找什么

translation.en: Don't worry. We've got this place covered.
translation.zh: 别担心 我们会守着这里

translation.en: She won't get near you or Charlie.
She's fast. You don't know how fast she is.
translation.zh: 她速度很快 快得你想象不到

translation.en: You know, your lack of confidence in us is a little insulting.
translation.zh: 你这么没信心是对我们的侮辱

translation.en: And lately, that's all the time.
translation.zh: 可最近我一直都是一个人
雅各布走了 他要去猎杀维多利亚
而查理去猎杀雅各布了

translation.en: [Bella] But I realize where I have to go.
What I have to do to see him again.
translation.zh: 我知道怎样才能再见到他

translation.en: You wanted me to be human.
You won't stay with me any other way.
translation.zh: 只有这样你才能和我在一起
醒醒 贝拉 呼吸

translation.en: Bella. Bella, can you hear me?
[Jacob] What the hell were you thinking?
I just wanted to see something.
Get her home! I'm gonna go help out over at Harry's place.
translation.zh: 送她回家 我去哈里家帮忙

translation.en: Harry Clearwater had a heart attack.
translation.zh: 哈里克里尔沃特心脏病发作

translation.en: Charlie and my dad are over at his place with his family.
translation.zh: 查理和我爸在他家陪着他的家人

translation.en: Come on. I'll get you something dry and drive you home.
translation.zh:
来吧 我去给你拿些干衣服
然后开车送你回家

translation.en: Hundred and eight degrees over here.
It must be nice never getting cold.
translation.zh: 不怕冷的感觉一定很棒

translation.en: It's not. It's a Jacob thing.
translation.zh: 不 只有雅各布是这样

translation.en: [Jacob] Is this better? Now that you know about me.
translation.zh: 现在你已经知道了我的事 这样真好

translation.en: You saw what happened to Emily.
translation.zh: 你也看到艾米丽的样子了

translation.en: Lost it for a split second…
He'll never be able to take that back.
What if I got mad at you?
translation.zh: 万一我对你生气怎么办？

translation.en: I feel like I'm gonna disappear.
translation.zh: 我觉得自己快要消失了

translation.en: Okay, not that you need me to tell you something like this.
translation.zh: 好了 其实你并不需要我… 对你说这种话

translation.en: But I always will. You're not gonna lose yourself.
translation.zh:
但我永远都会这么说
你不会失去自我
我不会让这种事情发生

translation.en: I'll tell you all the time…
I can smell it. I'm getting you out of here.
translation.zh: 我能闻到 我带你离开这里

translation.en: Bella, it's a trick. Stop! -You gotta come with me. -[grunts]
translation.zh: 贝拉 这是陷阱 停下 你得跟我走

translation.en: Look, if a Cullen is back here, this is their territory.
translation.zh: 如果卡伦回来 这里是他们的领地

translation.en: Treaty says we can only defend on our own lands.
translation.zh:
根据约定
我们只能保护我们自己的领地

translation.en: -I can't protect you here. -Okay, it's okay. You don't have to.
translation.zh:
-在这里我没法保护你
-没关系 不需要你保护我

translation.en: You're about to cross a line.

translation.zh: 那就不要划界线 求你了

translation.en: -Oh, my God. -[Alice] Bella. What are you… [gasps]
I'm sorry, I just-- I can't believe you're here. Is… [stutters]
translation.zh: 抱歉 我真不敢相信你会在这里 你…

translation.en: Would you like to explain to me how you're alive?
translation.zh: 能解释一下你为什么还活着吗？

translation.en: I saw a vision of you.
Why in the hell would you try and kill yourself?
-I mean, what about Charlie? What about-- -I didn't try to kill myself.
translation.zh:
查理怎么办？ -你…
-我没想自杀
我是在高崖跳水 是在玩

translation.en: I have never met anyone more prone to life-threatening idiocy.
translation.zh:
我从没见过
像你这么喜欢拿生命开玩笑的人

translation.en: Did you… did you tell him?
He only calls in once every few months.
translation.zh: 他每隔几个月才给我打一次电话

translation.en: He said he wants to be alone.
Bella, what is that god-awful wet dog smell?
translation.zh: 贝拉 你身上怎么一股狗臭味？

translation.en: Bella! Werewolves are not good company to keep.
translation.zh: 贝拉 狼人可不适合做朋友

translation.en: I had to see you were safe.
I thought you couldn't protect me here.
translation.zh: 我以为你在这里没法保护我

translation.en: [Alice] Well, I'm not going to hurt her.
No, you're just a harmless Cullen.
translation.zh: 确实 你只是无害的卡伦

translation.en: I'm talking about the other bloodsucker who tried to kill Bella because of you.
translation.zh:
我说的是另一个吸血鬼
因为你们 她想杀了贝拉

-维多利亚？
-是的 维多利亚在附近

translation.en: I didn't see you get pulled out of the water either.
translation.zh: 我也没预见到你被从水里拉上来

translation.en: I can't see past you and your pack of mutts.
translation.zh: 我没法预见你和你的那群狗杂种

别惹我 -别这样…
-否则休想善了

translation.en: -Or things are gonna get very ugly. -Stop, stop. Stop, stop.
You're not going anywhere, you're gonna come back, right?
translation.zh:
你不会离开吧？你会回来的 -对吧？
-等你把狗赶走 我就回来

translation.en: As soon as you put the dog out.
translation.zh:
-对吧？
-等你把狗赶走 我就回来

translation.en: Are there others? How many Cullens are here,
translation.zh: 其他人回来了吗？附近有几个卡伦？

translation.en: and how long are they staying?
And she can stay as long as she'd like.
Well, if that's all, then you'd better go run back to Sam.
translation.zh: 既然没事了 那你还是回去找山姆吧

translation.en: We don't have to do this to each other.

translation.zh: 究竟是谁？ 贝拉 退后

-杰克 究竟是谁？
-贝拉…是爱德华

translation.en: Bella, it's Edward. He thinks you're dead.
translation.zh:
-杰克 究竟是谁？
-贝拉…是爱德华 他以为你死了
罗莎莉告诉了他 我来这里的原因

translation.en: [Alice] Rosalie told him why I came here.
translation.zh:
他以为你死了
罗莎莉告诉了他 我来这里的原因

translation.en: Why would you… Why didn't you let me speak to him?
translation.zh:
你为什么…
你为什么不让我跟他说话？

translation.en: -He didn't ask for you. -I don't care!
translation.zh:
-他没有找你
-贝拉 -我不在乎
-贝拉 他要去找沃尔图里

translation.en: Bella, he's going to the Volturi.
translation.zh:
-我不在乎
-贝拉 他要去找沃尔图里

translation.en: [Jacob] He left you, Bella. He didn't want you anymore, remember?
translation.zh:
他已经离开你了 贝拉
他不想要你了 记得吗？

translation.en: No, I'm not gonna let him kill himself out of guilt.
translation.zh: 但我不能让他因为内疚而自杀

translation.en: I'm 18. I'm legally free to go and I left a note.
translation.zh:
我18岁了 从法律上讲
我可以自由出行 而且我还留了字条

translation.en: So you've made up your minds.
translation.zh: 看来你已经作出决定了
你独特的天赋是那么珍贵

translation.en: [clicks tongue] But if you're unhappy with your lot,
translation.zh: 你要是在族群里过得不开心

translation.en: We would be delighted to utilize your skills.
translation.zh: 我们很愿意利用你的能力

translation.en: Won't you consider staying with us?
You know it will happen anyway.
translation.zh: 你知道我终归会选择一死

translation.en: I'm guessing you didn't rent this car?
I figured you wouldn't be opposed to grand theft auto.
translation.zh: 我以为你不会反对偷车
怎么了？你预见到什么了？

translation.en: He's gonna make a scene. Show himself to the humans.
translation.zh:
-所以呢？
-他会大闹一场 -在人类面前暴露自己的身份
-不 什么时候？

-在人类面前暴露自己的身份
-不 什么时候？

translation.en: [Alice] He's gonna wait until noon, when the sun's at its highest.
translation.zh: 他会等到正午太阳最高的时候

-老天 爱丽丝 你得快点了
-那就是沃特拉城

translation.en: -Why are they all in red? -San Marco's Day festival.
translation.zh:
-他们为什么都穿红色的衣服？
-圣马可节

translation.en: They're commemorating the expulsion of vampires from the city.
translation.zh: 他们在庆祝吸血鬼被赶出城市

translation.en: The Volturi will never let him get far enough to reveal himself.
translation.zh: 沃尔图里家族绝对不会让他暴露身份
我知道 贝拉 深呼吸

translation.en: you're the only one he can't see coming.
translation.zh: 贝拉 你是唯一一个他预见不到的人

translation.en: If I go, he'll read my thoughts. He'll think I'm lying.
translation.zh:
如果我去了 他会读出我的想法
他会觉得我在骗他 就会提前行动

translation.en: -He'll rush into it. -Where do I go?
translation.zh:
如果我去了 他会读出我的想法
他会觉得我在骗他 就会提前行动 -我去哪找他？
-他会在钟楼下面 快去

translation.en: [Alice] He'll be under the clock tower. Go!
translation.zh:
-我去哪找他？
-他会在钟楼下面 快去

translation.en: Open your eyes, look at me. I'm alive.
translation.zh: 睁开眼睛看着我 我还活着

translation.en: I needed to make you see me once.
translation.zh: 我必须让你再见我一面

translation.en: You had to know I was alive,
you didn't have to feel guilty about anything.
I can let you go now.
I never acted out of guilt.
translation.zh: 我做的一切都不是出于内疚

translation.en: I just couldn't live in a world where you don't exist.
translation.zh: 我只是不想活在没有你的世界

translation.en: [Edward] I lied. I had to lie.
translation.zh:
-可你说…
-我说了谎 我不得不说谎
可你这么轻易就相信了

translation.en: But you believed me so easily.
translation.zh:
我不得不说谎
可你这么轻易就相信了

translation.en: Because it doesn't make sense for you to love me.
translation.zh: 因为你没有理由会喜欢我
我一无是处 只是个平凡的人类
贝拉 你是我的一切

translation.en: I won't be needing your services after all, gentlemen.
translation.zh: 我不需要你们的帮助了 先生们

translation.en: Aro wants to speak with you again.
Nonetheless, we should take this conversation to a more appropriate venue.
translation.zh:
尽管如此
我们还是应该换个合适的地方谈谈

translation.en: Bella, why don't you go enjoy the rest of the festival.
translation.zh: 贝拉 你去外面享受一下庆典吧？

translation.en: - The girl comes with us. - No, you can go to hell.
translation.zh: 那个女孩也得一起来 不行 想都别想

translation.en: It's a festival. You wouldn't want to make a scene.
translation.zh: 今天过节 你们是不会想要闹大的

translation.en: Aro sent me to see what was taking so long.
translation.zh: 阿罗派我来看看你们为什么这么慢

translation.en: [Alec] Sister. Send you out to get one and you bring back two.
translation.zh:
姐姐 他们派你去带他一个回来
你却带回来两个

translation.en: -Such a clever girl. -What a happy surprise!
translation.zh: 真机灵 多么让人高兴的惊喜

translation.en: [Aro] Her blood appeals to you so much.
How can you stand to be so close to her?
translation.zh: 你离她这么近 怎么忍得住？

translation.en: It's not without difficulty. Yes, I can see that. [laughs]
Aro can read every thought I've ever had with one touch.
translation.zh:
阿罗只要触碰到我
就能读到我所有的想法

translation.en: You are quite a soul reader yourself, Edward.
translation.zh: 你自己也是个出色的读心者 爱德华

translation.en: Though… you can't read Bella's thoughts.
translation.zh: 可你却读不出贝拉的想法

translation.en: I would love to see if…
you are an exception to my gifts, as well.
translation.zh: 我的能力在你身上是否也会失效

translation.en: Would you do me the honor?
Let us see if she is immune to all our powers.
translation.zh:
我们来看看
她是不是对我们的能力都免疫吧

translation.en: [Bella shouting] Stop! Just stop hurting him, please! Please!
translation.zh: 停下 不要再伤害他了 求你了…

translation.en: This may hurt just a little.
So, what do we do with you now?
You already know what you're going to do, Aro.
translation.zh: 你知道自己会怎么做 阿罗

translation.en: Kill me, kill me. Not him.
You would give up your life… for someone like us?
translation.zh:
你愿意为了我们这样的人
而放弃自己的生命

translation.en: You don't know a thing… about his soul.
translation.zh: 你根本不了解他的灵魂

translation.en: If only it were your intention to give her immortality.
translation.zh: 要是你想让她永生就好了

translation.en: Bella will be one of us.
translation.zh: 贝拉会成为我们的一员

translation.en: Mesmerizing, to see what you have seen…
translation.zh: 太美妙了 能预见未来发生的事

translation.en: Your gifts will make for an intriguing immortal.
translation.zh: 你的能力会让你成为一个迷人的 长生种

translation.en: Let us be done with this.
I would advise that you follow through on your promise soon.
translation.zh: 我建议你们尽快履行承诺

translation.en: [Caius] We do not offer second chances.
translation.zh: 我们不会给你们第二次机会
再见 年轻的朋友们

translation.en: Yes, they do look rather juicy.
translation.zh: 是啊 看上去相当可口

translation.en: I'll still be here when you wake up.
translation.zh: 我会一直陪着你 直到你醒

translation.en: [Edward] Bella. The only reason I left…
translation.zh: 贝拉 我之所以离开

translation.en: was because I thought I was protecting you.
translation.zh: 是因为我以为这样是在保护你

translation.en: I needed you to have a chance
translation.zh: 我想让你 有机会过正常而快乐的生活
有机会过正常而快乐的生活

translation.en: It was so easy for you to leave.
translation.zh: 你就这么轻易地一走了之

translation.en: Leaving you was the hardest thing I've done in 100 years.
translation.zh:
离开你是我这一百年来
做过的最困难的事

translation.en: Dad, you don't have to worry.
The last time you said that you took off.
translation.zh: 上次你也是这样说 然后就走了

translation.en: I didn't see you for three days.
translation.zh: 我整整三天没有见到你

translation.en: Bella… do not ever do that to me again.
translation.zh: 贝拉 不要再这样对我了

translation.en: for the rest of your life.
We're not technically breaking any of his rules.
translation.zh:
严格来说
我并没有违反他制订的规矩

translation.en: He did say I couldn't take a step inside the door.
translation.zh: 他说不让我再踏进家门一步

translation.en: I came in through the window.
He's not gonna forgive me easily.
I hope you can, 'cause I honestly don't know
translation.zh: 我希望你可以 因为我不知道没有了你 我还怎么活
因为我不知道没有了你 我还怎么活

translation.en: you can't get rid of me.
translation.zh: 你就再也没法摆脱我了

translation.en: She won't need to change you.
There are always ways to keep the Volturi in the dark.
translation.zh: 还有其他方法可以瞒着沃尔图里

translation.en: You all know what I want.
translation.zh: 你们都知道我想要什么

translation.en: And I know how much I'm asking for.
translation.zh: 我也知道我的要求很过分

translation.en: The only thing that I can think of for it to be fair is to just vote.
translation.zh: 我想唯一公平的办法就是投票了

translation.en: You don't know what you're talking about. Shut up.
translation.zh:
-你根本不知道自己在说什么
-别说话

translation.en: I already consider you my sister.
translation.zh: 我已经把你当成妹妹了

translation.en: It would be nice to not want to kill you all the time.
translation.zh: 不用一直想杀你 这样再好不过了

translation.en: I'm really sorry to both of you how I've acted.
translation.zh: 我为我之前的行为向你们道歉

translation.en: And I'm really grateful that you were brave enough
translation.zh: 我很感激你能够有勇气

translation.en: to go and save my brother.
But this isn't a life I would have chosen for myself.
translation.zh:
但如果是我
我不会为自己选择这样的生活

translation.en: And I wish that there had been someone to vote no for me.
translation.zh: 我希望有人能为我投反对票

translation.en: And we can pick a fight with these Volturi some other way.
translation.zh:
我们可以用另一种方式
和沃尔图里开战

translation.en: I already consider you a part of the family.
translation.zh: 我已经把你当成家人了

translation.en: Why are you doing this to me?
You've chosen not to live without her, which leaves me no choice.
translation.zh:
没有她 你就要去寻死
这让我别无选择

translation.en: [Bella] I'll wait until after graduation to make it easier on Charlie.
translation.zh:
我会等到毕业
这样查理会比较容易接受

translation.en: Edward, I want you to be the one to do it.
translation.zh: 爱德华 我希望由你来转变我

translation.en: He wants to talk to me.
[Jacob] So you're still alive for now.
[Edward] He thinks it's me keeping you away.
translation.zh: 他觉得是我不让你见他

translation.en: [Jacob] You stay the hell out of my head.
I know you have something to say to me.
translation.zh: 我知道你有话想对我说

translation.en: But I want to say something to you first, if that's all right.
translation.zh: 但如果可以的话 先让我说两句

translation.en: Thank you for keeping Bella alive when… I didn't.
translation.zh: 谢谢你在我无能为力的时候保护贝拉

translation.en: And it wasn't for your benefit, trust me.
translation.zh: 我这么做也不是为了你 相信我

translation.en: But I'm here now, and I'm not going to leave her side
translation.zh:
我现在回来了 除非她让我离开
否则我不会离开她半步

除非她让我离开
否则我不会离开她半步

translation.en: I'm here to remind you about a key point in the treaty.
translation.zh: 我来是为了提醒你约定中的一个要点

translation.en: If any of them bites a human, the truce is over.
translation.zh: 如果他们咬人 休战协议就会作废

translation.en: What if I choose it? It has nothing to do with you.
translation.zh: 可我要是自愿的 就与你们无关

translation.en: No. No, I won't let you.
You're not gonna be one of them, Bella.
translation.zh: 你不能成为他们中的一员 贝拉

translation.en: You know what we'll do to you. I won't have a choice.
translation.zh: 你知道我们会怎么对你 我别无选择
贝拉 走吧 等等

translation.en: Is he gonna hurt me? Read his mind.
translation.zh: 他会伤害我吗？用你的读心术
他是我一直以来的选择

translation.en: Goodbye, Jacob. No, you don't speak for her.
translation.zh:
-再见 雅各布
-不 别替她说话

translation.en: You can't hurt each other without hurting me.
translation.zh: 你们互相伤害只会伤害到我

translation.en: You shouldn't become what I am.
translation.zh: 你不应该变成我这个样子
如果你想让我亲自转变你

translation.en: If you want me to do it myself.
